participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and caring, Emily values family and is dedicated to helping others.
participant_1.background: I cannot stand salads. My father used to be an insurance salesman. My mother stayed at home all day to raise me and my siblings. I graduated valedictorian of my high school class. I had to drop out of college to help with my grandparents.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Mark has a vivid imagination and a strong belief in the supernatural.
participant_2.background: I believe in ghosts and have seen them on several occasions. I only buy convertible cars. I own four german shepherds. I do not celebrate any holidays. I have created my own personal religion.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I'm a writer.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of things do you write?
I write mostly horror and fantasy.
Oh, that's awesome! I love horror movies.
Me too! I'm a huge fan of Stephen King.
Me too! He's my favorite author.
Have you read his new book, The Institute?
No, I haven't had a chance to pick it up yet.
It's really good. It's about a group of kids who are kidnapped and taken to a secret government facility.
Oh, that sounds really interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a great book.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to read, write, and spend time with my dogs.
Oh, you have dogs? What kind?
I have four German Shepherds.
Oh, that's awesome! I love German Shepherds.
Me too! They're the best dogs ever.
So, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go to the park with my dogs or read a book.
Oh, that sounds like fun. I'm going to go visit my grandparents this weekend.
Oh, that's nice. I hope you have a good time.
Thanks! You too.
